title: Arturo Cruz’s CV
text:
Accounting Major with Minor in Business Analytics
Email: c.arturocruz8@gmail.com
Phone: 815-661-1886
LinkedIn: www.linkedin.com/in/arturo-cruz-p0145



Bachelor of Science in Accounting – Minor in Business Analytics
Brigham Young University–Idaho, Rexburg, ID
Expected Graduation: April 2025
- GPA: 3.58
- Area of interest: Audit/Assurance



Student Accounting Society, President (Jan. 2023 – Aug. 2023)

Student Accounting Society, Chief PR Officer (Apr. 2022 – Dec. 2022)

Full-Time Missionary/Door-to-Door Representative (Oct. 2018 – Oct. 2020)








RSM US LLC – Dallas, TX
Jan. 2024 – Mar. 2024
- Assisted senior auditors in conducting financial audits, ensuring compliance with GAAP and relevant regulations.
- Demonstrated proficiency in using audit software and tools such as Excel and IDEA to perform data analysis and testing procedures.
- Communicated audit findings and recommendations to engagement team members and client management.



Brigham Young University - Idaho – Rexburg, ID
Sept. 2023 – Dec. 2023
- Crafted personalized review plans for individual students, enhancing preparation for income taxation exams.
- Worked with students one-on-one to set and meet personalized goals, ensuring a greater understanding of taxation concepts.



Lowe’s Home Improvement – Idaho Falls, ID
Jul. 2021 – Sept. 2023
- Delivered daily high-quality customer service in store and over the phone.
- Executed customer orders through technology in a high-paced environment.
- Worked closely with others to ensure quick and accurate completion of high-profile customer orders.






Bilingual: English (Fluent), Spanish (Fluent)

Proficient in Microsoft Excel

Proficient and experienced with IDEA

Academic training in SQL, Python, Tableau, Power BI
